refnamediv.refpurpose: Conditionally transfer control during the i-time pass.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: During the i-time pass only, conditionally transfer control to the statement labeled by label.

refsect1.title: Syntax
refsect1.para: where label is in the same instrument block and is not an expression, and where condition uses one of the Relational operators (<, =, <=, ==, !=) (and = for convenience, see also under Conditional Values).

refsect1.title: Examples
refsect1.para:
Here is an example of the cigoto opcode. It uses the file cigoto.csd.
Example of the cigoto opcode.
See the sections Real-time Audio and Command Line Flags for more information on using command line flags.
Its output should include lines like:
instr 1: iparam = 0.000 instr 1: ifreq = 440.000 instr 1: iparam = 1.000 instr 1: ifreq = 880.000
